feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 4:53 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:58 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:58 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice pellets early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:58 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
